mapper.select: with r as (select s.id, s.user_card, s.user_name, s.status, s.create_on, IFNULL(u.user_name, s.create_by) as create_by, s.delete_flag from sys_user s left join sys_user u on s.create_by = u.user_card) select id, user_card, user_name, status, create_on, create_by, delete_flag from r ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select sys_user.id, sys_user.user_card, user_name, status from sys_user left join sys_user_info sur on sys_user.delete_flag = sur.delete_flag and sys_user.user_card = sur.user_card left join sys_department sd on sur.delete_flag = sd.delete_flag and sur.department_id = sd.id order by department_code = #{dto.departmentCode} desc, id desc
select id, user_card, user_name, password from sys_user where status = true and delete_flag = false

select u.user_card, user_name, sr.role_name, sd.department_name from sys_user u left join sys_user_info sui on u.delete_flag = sui.delete_flag and u.user_card = sui.user_card left join sys_department sd on sui.delete_flag = sd.delete_flag and sui.department_id = sd.id left join sys_user_role sur on sui.delete_flag = sur.delete_flag and u.user_card = sur.user_card left join sys_role sr on sui.delete_flag = sr.delete_flag and sur.role_id = sur.id where u.delete_flag = false and u.user_card = #{userCode}
